entry1.paragraph:
Your data is in safe hands. All your information is stored exclusively locally on your phone in a SQLite database and protected with strong 256-bit AES encryption. This ensures that no one but you can access it. We place great importance on privacy and deliberately avoid storing or sharing your data on external servers.

If you use the email service, your email address, password, and mail server are also protected with the same strong encryption before the data is processed. This keeps your sensitive information as secure as possible. Your privacy is our top priority — you always remain in full control of your data.

entry2.subheading: How does the email server work?
entry2.paragraph:
With our email service, you can easily send your application package directly to your chosen company's email address — all you need is the correct contact email. The subject line and an email template are generated automatically, making sending fast and convenient.

Your data is transmitted to our server using secure 2048-bit encryption. The server decrypts the application package and forwards it directly to the recipient. No logs are created and no data is stored permanently — the information is only held temporarily in cache and deleted immediately after forwarding.

We are already working on a fully local version of this service so you will have even more control over your data in the future. The service is completely free and optional — you decide whether you want to use it.

entry3.paragraph: You can either create a completely new cover letter or reuse an existing one. For only about 1 cent per generation, you can have a cover letter generated that is tailored to the position you want. Alternatively, you can reuse and modify a previous cover letter by selecting the company, redefining the contact person, and editing the text as you like. This saves time while still allowing you to adapt each application as needed.

entry1.title: 1. General information
entry1.text: This privacy policy explains how the application tool processes personal data.

entry2.title: 2. Collection and processing of data
entry2.text:
The tool only collects the data necessary to create an application:
• Desired job position
• Relevant skills
• Type of application

entry3.title: 3. Storage and security
entry3.text: All personal data is stored exclusively on the device and protected with AES-256-bit encryption.

entry4.title: 4. Disclosure to third parties
entry4.text: No personal data is shared with third parties. Only anonymized data used to generate the application is transmitted to AI service providers.

entry5.title: 5. User rights
entry5.text: Users have the right to access, correct, and delete their locally stored data.

entry6.title: 6. Changes to the privacy policy
entry6.text: This privacy policy may be updated. The current version is always available in the app.

entry3.title: Disclaimer
entry3.text: The contents of this app have been created with the greatest possible care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. Use of the app is at your own risk.

entry4.title: Copyright
entry4.text: All content in this app is protected by copyright. Use is permitted for private and non-commercial purposes only. Any further use, in particular commercial exploitation, requires the express consent of the copyright holder.
